Thank you for registering at personal monitoring app Chicken Buzz.We will guide you through a setup wizard with below steps. 1. About me--> Your information 2. Follow you--> Accept any pending requests. 3. Authorize users--> Send follow me requests to your friends and famailies.Please send authorization to at least three people. Note: Any user can be a primary contact for six users only. 4. My locations--> Add frequently visited location address with a nickname. 5. Send invite--> This app is inviation only for beta users. You can send 20 invitations to your friends and family members to use this APP. Mobile app Terms and Conditions. Coming Soon..... I autherize this app to collect below based sensors data. Decline Accept Save Reset Next Register Search Contacts Set interval to check with you. Start Stop Close
